articles.title: US anti-doping chief who caught Lance Armstrong says swimmer Shayna Jack is not a drug cheat - ABC News
articles.description: One of the most powerful figures in global anti-doping who caught disgraced drug cheat Lance Armstrong says Australian freestyle swimmer Shayna Jack has been caught up in an unjust system that is railroading innocent athletes.
